attributes.action: Invest Lenny Henry as a Knight of the Realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the amount of time and effort this individual has invested in Comic Relief We, the undersigned would like to see Mr Lenny Henry invested as a Knight of the Realm and be given the title Sir Lenny Henry.  This title to be bestowed on him by her Britannic Majesty Queen Elizabeth II in the 2009/10 New Years Honours List.
It is nothing short of miraculas what Lenny and his team have accomplished over 2 decades culminating in a new record of donations in 2009 is testiment to the hard work and effort put in.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
